Author: n0kikin0ki
Text: i know how you feel. husband is east asian so i'm going to have to lose another 20 pounds before he realizes that i've got a problem. super skinny is already the norm over here. he just thinks i have an interesting diet at this point.

Author: MagiPan
Text: You're always valid bby   Regardless of size, weight, race, ethnicity, height, whatever, you are valid.
